A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well paced\, full of twists\, left you guessing what would happen next. Action scenes are tight and full of drama and many shots look like paintings they are so beautiful. Rian Johnson did his homework\, paying homage to samurai and king fu films\, the World War Two epics and thrillers that influenced George Lucas. A fitting send off to a beloved character and some damn fine supporting performances as well.
